add_library(SDL2 SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)

target_include_directories(SDL2
INTERFACE
  .
)

set_property(TARGET SDL2 PROPERTY
  IMPORTED_LOCATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SDL2.lib
  IMPORTED_OBJECTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SDL2.dll
)

set_target_properties(SDL2 PROPERTIES INTERFACE_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
